data.text: @SenTinaSmith Yes but you radicalized your kids with lies and hate then sent them out to become misguided martyrs in your war against democracy. America voted for the illegals to go home.

@SenTinaSmith Islamic regime  in Iran is a threat to all countries around the world. Please end this regime NOW @POTUS
and bring peace to the world. Do not negotiate with this terrorist regime. Reza Palavi is our legitimate leader. #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026 #KingRezaPahlavi
@SenTinaSmith It wouldn't be if they weren't here illegally. I'm not sure why you guys don't get this.

@SenTinaSmith The students should be kept with their families

AND DEPORTED
@SenTinaSmith “Elected Democrats reject federal authority and declare their state independent from federal law.” also shouldn’t be a sentence, yet here we are. Just like your party did in 1861.
@SenTinaSmith "Tina Smith in Congress" shouldn't even be a sentence.
@SenTinaSmith There is no age limit on illegal entry
@SenTinaSmith Why the fuck are we paying to educate and house the third world and we dont have healthcare
